name: Morning Dew By Alvin Ashcraft
author: Alvin Ashcraft
description: One of my favorite aggregator blogs.  Mostly .Net related, but with great content in Design / Methodology areas

name: Build 5 Nines
author: Chris Pietschmann
description: Great content on Azure, DevOps, and other Microsoft related topics

name: Duncan Mackenzie
author: Duncan Mackenzie
description: Duncan is a great guy, and has a lot of great content on his blog. He was my manager at Microsoft for a while, and is doing great things in other places.

name: Scott Hanselman
author: Scott Hanselman
description: I have learned a lot from Scott over the years.  Check out his blog for great content on .Net, Azure, and other Microsoft related topics.

name: Creating passionate users
author: Kathy Sierra
description: Maybe my all time favorite content. I brush up on different articles in this blog every few months.
